name: pattern.css
description: CSS library of modern background patterns

scripts.build-dist: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true pattern.scss dist/pattern.css && node-sass --source-map true --output-style compressed pattern.scss dist/pattern.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-autoprefix
